Title: ¿Pueden los niños adquirir y aplicar conocimientos de emprendimiento?. El caso del subprograma, mi primer empresa: “emprender jugando”
Abstract summary: Children can acquire and apply entrepreneurship knowledge through a program that guides them to develop business plans.

Title: Desain Aplikasi Efkids untuk Menstimulasi Sikap Kewirausahaan pada Anak Usia Dini
Authors: Riska Aprilianti, Gaharani Saraswati, W. Azis
Abstract summary: The paper describes the design of the EFKIDS application to stimulate entrepreneurial attitudes in early childhood.

Title: A Technological Proposal Using Virtual Worlds to Support Entrepreneurship Education for Primary School Children
Authors: Ângela Pereira, P. Martins, Leonel Morgado, Benjamim Fonseca, Micaela Esteves
Venue: International Conference on Interactive Collaborative Learning
Abstract summary: A technological model for teaching entrepreneurship to primary school children using virtual worlds.

Title: Bimbingan Awal Kewirausahaan pada Anak Usia Dini
Abstract summary: Early entrepreneurship education for children can help develop their entrepreneurial mindset and skills.

Title: Designing and Using Games to Teach Business Skills to Children
Abstract summary: Games and simulations can be used to teach business skills to children.

Title: Entreprenurship For Kids Melalui Pendampingan Kewirausahaan Berbasis Lingkungan Sebagai Sarana Penunjang Experiental Learning Pendidikan Dasar Anak Sejak Dini
Abstract summary: A Kidspreneur Education Program using experiential learning helps develop entrepreneurial potential in young children.

Title: Pengenalan Dasar Kewirausahaan melalui Entrepreneurship for Kids (Studi Kasus pada TK Al-Amanah)
Abstract summary: The paper describes an entrepreneurship education program called "Entrepreneurship for Kids" implemented at a preschool to introduce entrepreneurship to young students.

Title: APPrender a leer y escribir: aplicaciones para el aprendizaje de la lectoescritura
Authors: Raquel Gómez-Díaz, A. García-Rodríguez, José-Antonio Cordón-García
Abstract summary: This paper is not relevant to the query about guided applications to help kids launch a business.
